overview: Meng Yao (Huang Wei), a single mother who is a live webcast, took her kindergarten daughter Wen Wen into a cheap school district. However, the strange atmosphere in the house and the strange stench from time to time made Meng Yao feeling anxious. One night, Wen Wen actually played the "disc fairy" game left by the former tenant in her sleepwalking.
title: Mortal Ouija
